\begin{center}
\bold{Article chosen:} Featurizing Text: Converting Text into Predictors for Regression Analysis by D.Foster,M. Liberman and R.Stine
\end{center}

\bold{Summary}

The paper expalins one methodology for modeling unstructured bodies of text and algorithmically (with minimal user input) converting them into numerical features that are suitable for regression analysis. A few techniques are proposed, including: using raw word counts, obtaining principal components from the counts or building regressors from counts of adjacent words.
